attributes.action: Stop all illegal street gambling on the streets of London!
attributes.additional_details:
these people are usually in gangs and have tricks to hide themselves from police but the only way we can stop this is if we actually try and get the government involved so by signing this petition we can save loads of people money. 
Thanks for all your attention.
attributes.background: The difference between casinos and all other legal gambling facilities, is that you have a chance to win, maybe not such a big chance but it's possible for you too win, but with illegal gambling, there is no chance of winning and they just steal people's money. these people are mostly foreign people

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Policing in London is the responsibility of the London Mayor's Office for Policing and Crime (MOPAC). MOPAC is overseen by the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
